blogPost.title: Mars becomes the 2nd planet that has more computers running Linux than Windows
blogPost.author: fireball_blaze

localize.title: 火星成为第2个运行Linux的计算机数量超过Windows的星球。

localize.title: 黑莓股票還能買嗎？
localize.the_new_excerpt:

月期間。
